attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The use of money (and maintaining an economy) is an inherently discriminatory act that leads to isolation of societies. i.e., you cannot have rich people without the poor to compare them to. It starts wars (and fuels them), and has been proven (through bribery) in the past to sway governments and leaders alike into actions not necessarily suited to the best needs of their nation(s).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
